title: How To Get Your Dog To Eat: A Pet Parent's Guide to Picky Eating
description: All dogs, large and small, need to eat proper, nutritious food. But what happens when your dog refuses to eat that food? It may happen once in a blue moon or once a day, but as a responsible dog owner you need to know what to do. This book provides all of the tools, tips and tricks you need to help man's best friend overcome any eating issues and become a happy, healthy dog.
author: Mary DiTosto
